get.summary: Get a collection of action plans

parameters.name: maxPageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries to return per page. Defaults to 1000.

put.summary: Update/Replace a complete action plan instance with no merge.

parameters.name: actionPlan
parameters.description: The instance of the plan to update. The entire plan will be replaced with this version.

parameters.name: actionPlan
parameters.description: The instance of the plan to create.

patch.summary: Update an action plan instance with merge

parameters.name: actionPlan
parameters.description:
The instance of the plan to update. Only the fields present in the passed in model will be updated. All other fields and colelctions
            will be left, as is, unless invalid.

get.summary: Get an instance of a specific action plan

parameters.name: actionPlanId
parameters.description: The action plan to update.

parameters.name: actionPlanId
parameters.description: The instance of the plan to delete.

parameters.name: actionPlanId
parameters.description: The instance of the plan that the objective belongs to.

parameters.name: objectiveId
parameters.description: The instance of the objective to delete.

get.summary: Gets adherence information for an action plan.

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: The start time.

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: The end time.

parameters.name: actionPlanId
parameters.description: The action plan identifier.

parameters.name: objectiveId
parameters.description: The objective to filter the report to.

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: The task to filter the report to.

get.summary: Get a collection of task definitions

parameters.name: maxPageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries to return per page. Defaults to 1000.

put.summary: Put an update for an action plan task

post.summary: Post a new action plan task

patch.summary: Patch an update for an action plan task

get.summary: Get a collection of all goals

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: The goal types(e.g Steps, CaloriesBurned) filter.

parameters.name: windowTypes
parameters.description: The goal window types(e.g Daily, Weekly) filter.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: The start date for date range filter.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: The end date for date range filter.

put.summary: Update/Replace a complete goal instance with no merge

parameters.name: goal
parameters.description: The instance of the goal to update. The entire goal will be replaced with this version.

post.summary: Post a collection of goal instances

parameters.name: goalsWrapper
parameters.description: The collection of goal instances to create.

patch.summary: Update collection of goal instances with merge

parameters.name: goalsWrapper
parameters.description:
The collection of goal instances to update. Only the fields present in the passed in model will be updated. All other fields and colelctions
            will be left, as is, unless invalid.

get.summary: Get an instance of a specific goal

parameters.name: goalId
parameters.description: The goal identifier.

parameters.name: goalId
parameters.description: The identifier of the goal to delete.

get.summary: Get a collection of the active goals

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: The goal types(e.g Steps, CaloriesBurned) filter.

parameters.name: windowTypes
parameters.description: The goal window types(e.g Daily, Weekly) filter.

get.summary: Get a collection of all goal recommendations

parameters.name: goalTypes
parameters.description: The goal types(e.g Steps, CaloriesBurned) filter.

parameters.name: goalWindowTypes
parameters.description: The goal window types(e.g Daily, Weekly) filter.

parameters.name: goalRecommendation
parameters.description: The instance of the goal recommendation to create.

get.summary: Get an instance of a specific goal recommendation

parameters.name: goalRecommendationId
parameters.description: The goal recommendation identifier.

parameters.name: goalRecommendationId
parameters.description: The identifier of the goal recommendation to delete.

put.summary: Updates the goal recommendation to acknowledged state

parameters.name: goalRecommendationId
parameters.description: The identifier of the goal recommendation to acknowledge.

parameters.name: onboardingRequest
parameters.description: The meta data associated with an onboarding request

get.summary: Get the Sleep Activity data for this user by date range

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: The ISO 8601 formatted start time of the Sleep activities, inclusive.

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: The ISO 8601 formatted end time of the Sleep activities, exclusive.  Defaults to the current time in UTC.

parameters.name: includeDetails
parameters.description: comma separated string to additional details. Available values Basic, Full. Default - Basic

parameters.name: maxPageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries to return per page.  Defaults to 31

nextLink.description: The URI for the next page of data

V2.ActionPlanInstance.description: An instance of an action plan associated to a user

id.description: The ID of the plan instance

organizationId.description: The ID of the organization that manages this plan. Read-only

organizationName.description: The name of the organization that manages this plan. Read-only

associatedTasks.description: The Task instances associated with this plan

name.description: The name of the plan, localized

description.description: The description of the plan, localized

imageUrl.description: An HTTPS URL to an image for the plan. Suggested resolution is 212x212 with a 25px margin in the image.

thumbnailImageUrl.description: An HTTPS URL to a thumbnail image for the plan. Suggested resolution is 212x212 with a 25px margin in the image.

objectives.description: The Collection of objectives for the plan

V2.ActionPlanTaskInstance.description:
An instance of an action a user should complete.
            Adherence to a plan is measured by completion statistics against tasks

id.description: The Id of the task instance

startDate.description: The date that the task was started. Read-only

endDate.description: The date that the task was ended. Read-only

organizationId.description: The ID of the organization that owns this task. Read-only

organizationName.description: The name of the organization that owns this task. Read-only

name.description: The friendly name of the task

shortDescription.description: The short description of the task

longDescription.description: The detailed description of the task

imageUrl.description: The image URL of the task. Suggested resolution is 200 x 200

thumbnailImageUrl.description: The thumbnail image URL of the task. Suggested resolution is 90 x 90

taskType.description: The type of the task, used to choose the UI editor for the task

signupName.description: The text shown during task signup.

associatedPlanId.description: The ID of the associated plan. This is not needed when adding a task as part of a new plan

associatedObjectiveIds.description: The list of objective IDs the task is associated with

completionType.description: The Completion Type of the Task

frequencyTaskCompletionMetrics.description: Completion metrics for frequency based tasks

schedules.description: Schedules for when a task should be completed.

Objective.description:
An objective is a high-level concept of what a user wants to accomplish as part of their enrollment in various action plans
            A user may have more than one objective
            A plan may contribute to more than one objective
            Each objective can have one measurable outcome

id.description: The unique identifier of the instance of the objective

outcomeName.description: Gets or sets the name of the outcome

outcomeType.description: Gets or sets the type of the outcome

ActionPlanTrackingPolicy.description: The tracking policy to apply to the Action Plan Task

isAutoTrackable.description: Gets or sets an indicator as to whether or not the Tracking Policy is AutoTrackable

occurrenceMetrics.description: Gets or sets the Occurrence Metrics for the tracking policy

targetEvents.description: The target events to track against

V2.ActionPlanFrequencyTaskCompletionMetr.description: The Completion Metrics for frequency based tasks

windowType.description: The window in which the occurrences must be completed

occurrenceCount.description: The number of times the Task has to be completed

V2.Schedule.description: A schedule for an action plan task

reminderState.description: The reminder state of the task

scheduledDays.description:
The days that this will show for the user
            Expected values: { 'Unknown', 'Everyday', 'Sunday', 'Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday' }

scheduledTime.description: The time at which this task is scheduled

evaluateTargets.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not to evaluate the targets

targets.description: Gets or sets the targets to evaluate

ActionPlanTaskTargetEvent.description: The tracking properties of a HealthVault event

elementXPath.description: XML XPath to the property for which task should be tracked

elementValues.description: List of all of the possible values for a given xPath property. (i.e. "run", "running", "walk" etc).

isNegated.description: Flag to indicate if the condition mentioned above is negated. e.g. Item shouldn't be a run or a walk.

Time.description: Represents a time without a date

ActionPlanRangeMetric.description: Defines the Action Plan Range Numeric

propertyName.description: Gets or sets the property name the metric applies to

valueType.description: Gets or sets the Value Type of the Metric

maxTarget.description: Gets or sets the Max value of the target

minTarget.description: Gets or sets the min value of the target

propertyXPath.description: Gets or sets the XPath of the property that the metric applies to

Microsoft.Health.Platform.Entities.V1.Ac.description: Base class for all CompositeActivity Activities

id.description: The unique identifier of the activity (unique by user)

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user who completed the activity

deviceId.description: The identifier of the device which generated the activity

startTime.description: The ISO 8601 formatted start time of the activity

endTime.description: The ISO 8601 formatted end time of the activity

dayId.description:
The mapping of an event to a logical date. For most events, other than sleep,
            the default assignment is based on the event's start time. This is subject to change
            in the future. For example, if a sleep activity starts before 5 AM, the DayId is the previous day.

createdTime.description: The ISO 8601 formatted time the activity was created

createdBy.description: The app that created the activity

duration.description: The ISO 8601 formatted duration of the activity

minuteSummaries.description: The summaries associated with this activity

caloriesBurnedSummary.description: The summary of calories burned during the activity

heartRateSummary.description: The heart rate summary for the activity

uvExposure.description: The UV exposure as time in the sun.

dataSourceTypes.description: The collection of sources which contributed to this activity

id.description: The unique identifier of the activity (unique by user)

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user who completed the activity

deviceId.description: The identifier of the device which generated the activity

startTime.description: The ISO 8601 formatted start time of the activity

endTime.description: The ISO 8601 formatted end time of the activity

dayId.description:
The mapping of an event to a logical date. For most events, other than sleep,
            the default assignment is based on the event's start time. This is subject to change
            in the future. For example, if a sleep activity starts before 5 AM, the DayId is the previous day.

createdTime.description: The ISO 8601 formatted time the activity was created

createdBy.description: The app that created the activity

duration.description: The ISO 8601 formatted duration of the activity

minuteSummaries.description: The summaries associated with this activity

caloriesBurnedSummary.description: The summary of calories burned during the activity

heartRateSummary.description: The heart rate summary for the activity

uvExposure.description: The UV exposure as time in the sun.

dataSourceTypes.description: The collection of sources which contributed to this activity

Microsoft.Health.Platform.Entities.V1.Su.description: Summary information over a period of time

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user

startTime.description: The ISO 8601 formatted start time of the period

endTime.description: The ISO 8601 formatted end time of the period

parentDay.description: The ISO 8601 formatted parent day of the period

isTransitDay.description: True if the user transitioned time zones during this period, else false

period.description: The length of the time bucket for which the summary is calculated

duration.description: The ISO 8601 formatted duration of the period

stepsTaken.description: The total number of steps taken during the period

floorsClimbed.description: The total number of floors climbed during the period

caloriesBurnedSummary.description: The summary of the calories burned during the period

heartRateSummary.description: The summary of heart rate data during the period

distanceSummary.description: The summary of the distance data during the period

activeHours.description: The number of active hours during the period. Active hour is an hour with more than 600 steps

uvExposure.description: The UV exposure as time in the sun.

activeSeconds.description: The number of active seconds during the period

dataSourceTypes.description: The collection of data sources which contributed to this summary

period.description: The length of the time bucket for which the summary is calculated

totalCalories.description: The total calories burned during the period

period.description: The length of the time bucket for which the summary is calculated

averageHeartRate.description: The average heart rate achieved during the period

peakHeartRate.description: The peak heart rate achieved during the period

lowestHeartRate.description: The lowest heart rate achieved during the period

period.description: The length of the time bucket for which the summary is calculated

totalDistance.description:
The total distance during the period.
            If this is a time-based summary, e.g. hourly or daily, then this is the total distance of the period.
            If this is an activity split summary, e.g. splits of a run, then this is the split distance, e.g. 1 mile, 1 kilometer.
            For the last split of the activity, this value may be less than the full split distance.

totalDistanceOnFoot.description: The total distance covered on foot during the period

actualDistance.description: The absolute distance including any paused time distance during the period

elevationGain.description: The cumulative elevation gain accrued during the period in cm

elevationLoss.description: The cumulative elevation loss accrued during this period in cm

maxElevation.description: The maximum elevation during this period in cm

minElevation.description: The minimum elevation during this period in cm

waypointDistance.description: The distance in cm between recorded GPS points

speed.description: The average speed during the period

pace.description: The average pace during the period

overallPace.description: The total distance to the end of this period divided by total time to the end of this period

Microsoft.Health.Platform.Entities.V1.Ac.description: Base class for all Exercise Activities

exerciseTypeName.description: Gets or sets the localized name of the exercise being completed

performanceSummary.description: The performance summary for the activity

distanceSummary.description: The summary of distance data during the activity

pausedDuration.description: The ISO 8601 formatted length of time the user was paused during the activity

splitDistance.description: The split distance used for the activity

stepsTaken.description: The total number of steps taken during the activity

mapPoints.description: The map points for the activity

id.description: The unique identifier of the activity (unique by user)

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user who completed the activity

deviceId.description: The identifier of the device which generated the activity

startTime.description: The ISO 8601 formatted start time of the activity

endTime.description: The ISO 8601 formatted end time of the activity

dayId.description:
The mapping of an event to a logical date. For most events, other than sleep,
            the default assignment is based on the event's start time. This is subject to change
            in the future. For example, if a sleep activity starts before 5 AM, the DayId is the previous day.

createdTime.description: The ISO 8601 formatted time the activity was created

createdBy.description: The app that created the activity

duration.description: The ISO 8601 formatted duration of the activity

minuteSummaries.description: The summaries associated with this activity

caloriesBurnedSummary.description: The summary of calories burned during the activity

heartRateSummary.description: The heart rate summary for the activity

uvExposure.description: The UV exposure as time in the sun.

dataSourceTypes.description: The collection of sources which contributed to this activity

Microsoft.Health.Platform.Entities.V1.Su.description: Summary of the Performance Metrics for an Exercise

finishHeartRate.description: The heart rate when the user finished the exercise

recoveryHeartRateAt1Minute.description: The heart rate one minute after the user finished the exercise

recoveryHeartRateAt2Minutes.description: The heart rate two minutes after the user finished the exercise

heartRateZones.description: The breakdown of the heart rate zones during the exercise

secondsSinceStart.description: The number of seconds that have elapsed since mapping began, typically the start of a run or other activity

ordinal.description: The absolute ordering of this point relative to the others in its set, starting from 0

actualDistance.description: The distance not including distance traveled while paused, it is the distance that splits are based off of, since splits ignore paused time

totalDistance.description: The total distance from the start point to this map point

heartRate.description: The heart rate at the time of this map point

scaledPace.description:
A number between 0 and 100 that denotes the pace/speed between the slowest and fastest instantaneous pace for the
            overall route. Slowest segment in the route (highest pace, lowest speed) is 0 and fastest segment
            (lowest pace, highest speed) is 100. Only makes sense in the context of the set of all map points.

location.description: The GPS location for this map point

isPaused.description: A value indicating whether or not this map point occurred during paused time

isResume.description: A value indicating whether or not this map point is the first one since the activity resumed

Microsoft.Health.Platform.Entities.V1.He.description:
Distribution of Heart Rates through a range of values defined by Fitness experts 
            which determine the effectiveness of the exercise

underHealthyHeart.description: The number of minutes where the HR was below 50% of the user's max HR

underAerobic.description:
Note: this field is deprecated. The correct field name is now UnderHealthyHeart. Populated for backwards compatibility until V2
            The number of minutes where the HR was below 50% of the user's max HR

aerobic.description: The number of minutes where the HR was between 70-80% of the user's max HR

anaerobic.description: The number of minutes where the HR was between 80-90% of the user's max HR

fitnessZone.description: The number of minutes where the HR was between 60-70% of the user's max HR

healthyHeart.description: The number of minutes where the HR was between 50-60% of the user's max HR

redline.description: The number of minutes where the HR was between 90-100% of the user's max HR

overRedline.description: The number of minutes above the user's max HR

speedOverGround.description: The speed over ground for the GPS point in m/s * 100

latitude.description: The latitude for the GPS point in degrees * 10^7 (+ = North)

longitude.description: The longitude for the GPS point in degrees * 10^7 (+ = East)

elevationFromMeanSeaLevel.description: The elevation from mean sea level in m * 100

estimatedHorizontalError.description: The estimated horizontal error in m * 100

estimatedVerticalError.description: The estimated vertical error in m * 100

description.description: The description of the plan, localized

imageUrl.description: An HTTPS URL to an image for the plan. Suggested resolution is 212x212 with a 25px margin in the image.

ActionPlanTaskTracking.description: A tracking object for an Action Plan Task

id.description: Gets or sets the Id of the task tracking

trackingType.description: Gets or sets the task tracking type

timeZoneOffset.description:
Gets or sets the timezone offset of the task tracking, 
            if a task is local time based, it should be set as null

trackingDateTime.description: Gets or sets the task tracking time

creationDateTime.description: Gets or sets the creation time of the task tracking

trackingStatus.description: Gets or sets the task tracking status

occurrenceStart.description:
Gets or sets the start time of the occurrence window,
            it is null for Completion and OutOfWindow tracking

occurrenceEnd.description:
Gets or sets the end time of the occurrence window,
            it is null for Completion and OutOfWindow tracking

completionStart.description: Gets or sets the start time of the completion window

completionEnd.description: Gets or sets the end time of the completion window

feedback.description: Gets or sets the tracking feedback

evidence.description: Gets or sets the evidence of the task tracking

ActionPlanTaskTrackingEvidence.description: The evidence associated Action Plan Task Tracking

nextLink.description: The URI for the next page of data

Goal.description:
A goal defines a target for a measurement or action to be performed by a user.
            For example, walk 5000 steps per day, burn 1500 calories per day

id.description: The unique identifier of a goal instance.

name.description:
The name of the goal.
            For example, Daily walk goal

startDate.description: The start date of the goal in Universal Time Zone(UTC).

endDate.description:
The end date of the goal in Universal Time Zone(UTC). 
            If the end date is in the future, this is the target date.

goalType.description: Specifies the type of data related to this goal.

recurrenceMetrics.description:
The goal recurrence metrics.
            For example, A goal can be defined on a weekly interval, meaning the target is intended to be achieved every week. Walking 50000 steps in a week.

range.description:
The primary range of achievement for the goal. 
            For example, the ideal weight or daily steps target.

additionalRanges.description: Other ranges of achievement for the goal.

GoalRecurrenceMetrics.description: The recurrence metrics for a goal.

windowType.description: Specifies the recurrence window of the goal

occurrenceCount.description:
Specifies the number of times the goal's target is intended to be achieved in given window
            For example, the goal "walk 5000 steps, 4 times per week" would be represented as: a window of a "week", an occurrence count of 4, and a goal target of 5000.

GoalRange.description: The range of achievement for a goal.

description.description: The description of the range. Allows more detailed information about the range.

minimum.description:
The minimum value for the range.
            For ranges greater than a specified value with no maximum, specify a minimum but no maximum.

maximum.description:
The maximum value for the range.
            For ranges less than a specified value with no minimum, specify a maximum but no minimum.

nextLink.description: The URI for the next page of data

GoalRecommendationInstance.description: An instance of a goal recommendation associated to a user

organizationId.description: The ID of the organization that manages this recommendation

organizationName.description: The name of the organization that manages this recommendation

acknowledged.description: Specifies if the user has used the recommendation to set a goal.

expirationDate.description: The expiration date of the recommendation in Universal Time Zone(UTC).

GoalRecommendation.description: A goal recommendation being created for a user

expirationDate.description: The expiration date of the recommendation in Universal Time Zone(UTC).

OnboardingRequest.description: The content passed from a client during the onboarding process

secretQuestion.description: Gets or sets the user's secret question

secretAnswer.description: Gets or sets the user's secret answer

firstName.description: Gets or sets the user's first name.

lastName.description: Gets or sets the user's last name.

email.description: Gets or sets the user's email address

zipCode.description: Gets and sets the user zip code/postal code

state.description: Gets and sets the user's state

country.description: Gets and sets the user's country/region

birthday.description: Gets and sets the user's birthday

gender.description: Gets and sets the user gender

weight.description: Gets and sets the user's weight

height.description: Gets and sets the user's Height

actionPlanTemplateIds.description:
Gets or sets the list of action plan template ids to which the user 
            will be assigned upon account creation

conditions.description: Gets or sets the list of health conditions that will be displayed to the user during consent collection

invitationCode.description: Gets or sets the invitation code.

inviteUrl.description: Get Or Set the invite url

nextLink.description: The URI for the next page of data
The URI for the next page of data

sleepId.description: The unique identifier for the Sleep Activity

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user

startTime.description: The ISO 8601 formatted start time of the activity

endTime.description: The ISO 8601 formatted end time of the activity

wakeState.description: The WakeState at the end of Activity, possible values are WideAwake, Tired, Sleepy

lastModifiedBy.description: Gets or sets the audit record for the last time the entity was changed

createdBy.description: Gets or sets the audit record for when the entity was first created

bedtime.description: The ISO 8601 formatted time the user went to bed

fallAsleepDuration.description: The ISO 8601 formatted time the user took to fall asleep

wakeupTime.description: The ISO 8601 formatted time the user woke up

sleepDuration.description: The ISO 8601 formatted time the user was asleep during the activity

Audit.description: Tracks when a change was made to a tracked entity, by whom, and by which application

timestamp.description: Gets or sets when the change was made

personId.description: Gets or sets who made the change

applicationId.description: Gets or sets which application that made the change

auditAction.description: Gets or sets the audit action for the change
